Salt_Lake_City.Kearns-Saint Ann Catholic School: Kearns-Saint Ann School is a Catholic school located in South Salt Lake, Utah, built in 1899. It is home to students in grades Preschool through 8th grade. Kearns-Saint Ann School began as an orphanage in the late 1800s, and continues its legacy of the caring for and educating of children which was begun in 1891 by the Sisters of the Holy Cross.
